description:
Cuddly Sunshine Fresh Concentrated Liquid Fabric Softener Conditioner 2L 80 Washes is Made in Australia with a Long Lasting Fragrance; Designed for Luxurious Softness Easy Iron Reduces wrinkles Reduces Static Helps clothes look newer for longer and Fast Drying

Immerse you and your family in the fresh outdoor scent of a beautiful summer morning

The luxurious softness and long lasting freshness you expect from Cuddly is combines with the classic Sunshine Fresh fragrance to give that little bit extra to show you care

Cuddly Concentrate Liquid Fabric Softener Conditioner
Luxurious softness
Long Lasting Fragrance capsules
An Uplifting fresh fragrance

Directions for use fill cap as shown on packaging
Top loader Cuddly can be added to your machines fabric softener conditioner dispensing unit or diluted and added to the final rinse
Front loader Add Cuddly to your machines fabric softener conditioner dispensing unit only This is often marked with a flower Never pour directly onto fabrics

Grey water and septic tank safe Proudly made in Australia with recyclable packaging

Size 2L
Washes 80

FABRIC SOFTENER CONDITIONER Cuddly Concentrate Sunshine Fresh Liquid Fabric Softener Conditioner provides luxurious softness and long lasting freshness you expect to give that little bit extra to show you care

SOFTEN YOUR FABRICS Provides luxurious softness

LONG LASTING FRAGRANCE An uplifting fresh fragrance of a beautiful summer morning with long lasting fragrance capsules

RECYCLABLE Cuddly Concentrate Sunshine Fresh Fabric Softener Conditioners are made in recyclable packaging
name: Cuddly Concentrate Fabric Conditioner Sunshine Fresh 2L
